name: Bubble Pop! - Shoot&Win
description:
An exciting bubble shooting game is right here with stunning gameplay! Shoot out the bubbles and match the same to eliminate it！

If you haven't played this type of game before, then you shouldn't miss it!

Spotlights:
Free to play
Colorful and exquisite graphics design
Flexible shooting mechanism
Useful boosts and tools help you do better
Thinking globally and act locally
Easy to start but hard to be a real master
Play with friends around the world

The game is easy to start and play! But there are also challenges for you! See how you can pass levels in the late game, and see how good you are in problem-solving!

Download now and start your shooting adventure! Enjoy endless fun and relaxation! Let‘s have fun!
